ALEJANDRO.raw_line: I think about the price. The price of appetite. The cost of forgetting who we are. Pretending we are... who we will never be...So easy to pretend we are not to blame. That a demon enters us. No... The demon is inside. We just make potions that release it.There's no revenge for all they have taken. No justice. It simply is...And still. They must be forced to look at all they have destroyed. By having the same done to them. Or they will forget... Forget they are human. Believe they are as different as they feel... Then they are the lion, and everything we loved and lost, simply its meal.And you too...Say it.Sit down.Can't walk back like this. We need to dry.Nothing.No.Nothing. I just wanted to know.Don't give me a reason.By telling me the truth without having to drown you.If you are very lucky you never will.It is the Colonel.Why so many?Where are we going?What did they do?Thank you.Hello.Have you been to Juarez before?What is your experience with operations like these?Sleep if you can. Juarez will demand all of your focus.Yes.I'm fine.Hmm?Yes.You are asking how a watch works. For now, only focus on knowing the time.Pay attention.Memorize the faces of everyone here. Know who is with you.I worked in Juarez.No.Mexico. As a federal prosecutor.No.I go where I'm sent.Cartagena.Want to see Juarez?Hard to believe, yes?He wears the state police shirt. The pig -- Not what you think it means. All state police work for the cartels. ALL of them. That man... He tried to work for two... he got greedy.Nothing will happen here. If they try anything, it will be at the border. If no lane is cleared for us when we return... Be ready. Watch the cars. Look for old cars. Throw aways. Not gangster cars... Those are for the whores on Saturday night. Did you watch the cars we passed driving in?Watch for state police. They are all bad. We will lose the escort at the loop. You will see. That is when you worry.Lean back, Kate.On the left.You have a service weapon?Get it out.Silver LeSabre. Two lanes over myGun. Buick LeSabre, 3 o'clock, gun.watch the door handles.All the women can go.Watch these men close. Look for the ones like the men you saw in Juarez.Do you see?Yes. Keep looking.They see it all, and must avoid the traps set everywhere for them. We look for one who is older... one who has had enough.Break them into groups of four, Let them spread out, each group as far from the other as possible.Fausto Alarcon, Manuel's cousin... Manuel's boss... He is an executioner...When people die in my country, it is with his hand or his blessing. To find him would be like... discovering a vaccine. Manuel will lead us to him.Certainly, you understand the value of that.There is only dark, my friend.We should watch here.You know this land? A tunnel where cars can pass?Can you mark the tunnel on here?This is our way across. Right here. Where do you live?Know a Wells Fargo on Baseline?Guillermo told the truth about everything.Thank you ... don't cross again. Not for a long time.Better than good, my friend.We are close.Don't go in the bank, Kate.We need him to get called back to Mexico. That's the objective, Kate.How many officers do they have on the force?You want the truth?Give the names, give the houses, phone numbers ... Give me all of you.He wasn't an assassin. He was just supposed to be your friend and hopefully find out who is showing you how to hurt them. They are looking for us, not you.I've been doing this for a long time.In Mexico, police do not investigate crimes for the government. Attorneys do. That's what I did. I was very close to arresting someone who ... someone I shouldn't have tried to arrest.The brilliance of what they do when they mutilate a body is make people think -- Oh, that person must have done something to receive such a death. They must have been involved.They must have deserved it ... And for the family ... It soils every memory you have of that person. They make it impossible to imagine the face you loved without seeing the initials carved into her forehead. Imagine her body without seeing her chest with -- remember her before...Her breasts were cut off ... Remember your child without ...They kill the body, the memory, everything.You remind me of my wife. I find it very difficult to look at you.Get some rest tonight. Tomorrow they will call Manuel back, and we will cut a leg from them.I don't use those. Ask Matt.Take the left shaft ... Make noise.No. Draw them to you. The one I am looking for will try and run.What you do now is for your family. Whether they see tomorrow rests with you.You will drive me.Put that down.We are in Mexico now. You have no jurisdiction.Don't ever point a weapon at me again. Get your breath and go back to the surface.Stop it Kate. Just stop. This is what we were sent here to do.I don't have time. Go to the surface. Now.I am here to kill the man with the power to summon Manuel Diaz. I am here for Fausto. But I will kill Manuel too. It's what I do, Kate. Go. Or I will do it to you.Get in.Drive back to Mexico.I am through, do you have my location?Este a calle cinquinta y seis.Having family... does that save the lives of the men you are hired to kill? Hmm?This is the target ahead? Confirm.Put on your lights. Pull the car over.Use the speaker. Tell him to get out of the car.Tell him to raise his shirt and turn around.Tell him to do it or you will shoot him where he stands.Look how good you are at pretending to be a police officer. Out of the car. Now.Walk back to your car.A mule. Like you.In the leg so you don't run. In the hand so you don't try to fight and make me have to kill you yet.I know who you are, Manuel. You are no jefe, but you will drive me to one...If you try anything, if you betray me, your daughters will burp the semen of twenty men with their last breath. Do you understand me?Get in.Drive.You get out and walk toward them.What you do now is for your family. There is no you.No. Not anymore. Now I am the same. Turn the car a bit more to the left.SIENTATE! AQUI!!Your children speak English?Then we will spare them. I interrupted dinner. Please... Continue.Every night, you have families killed, and yet you dine. Tonight should be no different.Eat.Take the children away from here.You. Whore. Sit over there.You're not finished. Eat...I will give you a choice, Fausto, one I was not given... You may choose to die tonight or live with the shame of having the mother of your children take your place...Yes ... Choose.See why you married her. Spunk.Watch death come for you. Watch. The devil is near, Fausto. He is waiting for you.This is what they think of you. You see?Maybe you have enough pride that you don't marry another one of these. Maybe you take his money and go hide and raise your children far from here. Maybe your son grows up to be a doctor. And I don't have to come back and kill him some day.I think maybe, it will be the thing that kills us all ... as a people, you know?Stop it.That will scar. I'm sorry.Let me look ... Move your hand.These ribs are bruised, but not broken, yes?I would recommend not standing on balconies for a little while.In Mexico, the killers are called Sicarios... The word comes from the zealots of Jerusalem. Killers who hunted the Romans that invaded their homeland... They don't deserve the term.Policing them does nothing. They must be killed. Wherever they are found. They will make every place they touch Juarez. Now ... Now you understand how far we have fallen.You look like a girl when you're scared. Such beauty in you when you let yourself be frail. Like the daughter they took from me ... This is not the work for you. Look at yourself, Kate. What it has done to you in just three days ... Find a little town far from the border. A place where the rule of law still exists. You will spot predators there very easy now... Make a difference you can see everyday. Because you will not survive here. You are not a wolf. This is the land of wolves now.We like to think if we cut the head from the snake, the serpent will die...But there is no snake. They are worms. When you cut the head, a new one grows. From both segments ... We cannot question if the end justifies the means because there is no end to consider...This is the price of our self indulgence. Our weakness ... Our appetite. They are our demons, our creation.There is a moment in each person's life. A choice. Do what feels good... Do what is good. Make the wrong choice enough, and it is not presented again... then all choices are bad. And the consequences worse. There is no war on drugs. Only war. The enemy we fight? Ourselves ...

MACY.raw_line: Give us this day... our daily bread...And forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us.And lead us not into temptation but deliver us from evil...For Thine is the Kingdom the power and glory forever and ever amen DOWN MOTHER FUCKER!! DOWN DOWN DOWN!!!I'm good. I'm good.Can't shake the smell. Just sits in you.I saw.Couldn't smell any worse.Yeah. Thirty families without a father's real funny, but you keep worrying about what it does to your weekend, Lance.It's your crime scene when I GIVE IT TO YOU!!!... None.No.I'm fine.Wanna give me the tour?No way to connect him, but he owns it.Go ahead and step out, it's okay.OW.Not tonight mom.Uhh... Mom, it was a REALLY TOUGH--Me too. You get my card?Mom, I just got --I'm signing on.Stay in one place, Mom. Happy birthday. Sorry I didn't call-Nothing. It's something on your lens.Like I said, rough day.Who came to the party?No.I'm sure we'll be great friends, Mother. Nothing like a divorce to bring people closer.I am... Happy birthday. How does it feel to be 60?I DON'T WANT TO TALK ABOUT GRANDCHILDREN. Yeah, umm... I can, I can be there in, say thirty minutes? Yes sir.No idea.I need coffee.Come on ... Of course.Jesus.His company, Sun Valley, owns eighty or so foreclosure properties, another --Um ... Wasn't aware he had one.Didn't know he had one of those either.I don't know who that is.None of this is in his file.I'm not --I'm sorry?Divorced.No. He works for Border Patrol and got to keep the condo and my Bronco, anything else?I have no clue.He'll be leading who? This is Phoenix Homicide now.What does that mean?Luke ... Air Force base?His brother.Okay... If I, umm... What's our objective?Why isn't Reggie in here?We get an opportunity at the men responsible for today?Then yeah, sure. I'll volunteer.Yeah. I'll call you, let you know what time.It's El Paso... Don't think you're missing much.I'm supposed to worry about you.We do what we need to do.I'll call you when we're heading back.Am I late?Kate Macy.No... Wait, we're going to El Paso, right?We're taking this?Really... Okay...None... What IS the operation?Are we going into Juarez?DOD flies around in Gulfstreams now?Right... Food on this flight?JESUS!!You okay?So... This is your specialty.He said the cartels in Mexico are your specialty.Anything I should know?Okay... Yoda.Ever been over there?For the DEA?For who?You're not American?Who do you work for now?Where were you sent FROM?... Colombia?Is he CIA? Are you?Well?I'm not authorized to --I just wanna know what I'm getting INTO --So how nervous should I be?Yes.Jesus.Yes.Okay... okay...Think... think...Okay...WHAT THE FUCK ARE WE DOING??!!This is going to be on the front page of every newspaper in America.JUST... Give me a minute.No. No. Don't... NO. This isn't ... This was a SPECIAL OP. You're a fucking spook. And HIM!! Who the fuck is that??I'm not qualified for this. I'm good at what I do, but I'm not a soldier.Don't put me in a situation where I have to break the law to stay alive. Don't do that to me.Hey. Got another one of those?Been a while. Thanks.Fireworks is code for something, I assume.I don't hear anything.Unbelievable.From here? Little over two hours.We're going to Tucson?REGGIE-We're going to Tucson.Bad.Now's not the time.I don't even know what we're doing here. Got another one of those?We weren't in El Paso.We were in Mexico.Him.Yeah. I see it.What are we looking for?I'm with you, alright. I don't have answers.You think I haven't asked these questions. Think you can do better? MATT. Can we talk to you for a minute?I walk too.He TOLD you where a drug tunnel is... Just... Told you.Bullshit.What happens when you find him?This is a blessing, trust me. I want to stop and get some cigarettes.Worse.What's up?Yep.Want some coffee?I have to get dressed. Come up.List of things I need is almost infinite.Been so long since anyone's seen me in a bra, except you... don't look at me like that. No pity, thank you....I don't know.Guy works eighty hours a week and thinks I'm too focused on my job.Ask me something else.It's broken ... The whole place. Just ... Lost.Me too. But... I have to know.Could it get that bad here?Yeah...Are you getting this?Not great.Border patrol's not down there.Yeah, we use them for breeches when HRT is busy.Yeah... they get a lot of practice.What did you find out?What is she doing?You guys coming?This is something I can actually build a case on.These are all Manuel Diaz's accounts?And you can seize that.What?No.Oh my god.They just seized seventeen million dollars... I need that explained to me. Guillermo Diaz told you all that in an HOUR?We can arrest Manuel for now. At least get him off the street.That makes NO sense... We can get him off the street! RIGHT NOW. If I can tie any of these payments to--Watch me.This is ridiculous. His guys are robbing people IN FRONT OF THE BANK... So we find out where his boss lives in Mexico. Big deal. I've seen the Mexican police in action and believe me --I would like to follow some semblance of procedure, and build a prosecutable case against --No.Where'd that guy say the safe banks were, Cave Creek?Ever been there?North of Scottsdale. Horse country...Big saloon there called the Buffalo Chip... Feel like a beer somewhere far away?Yeah. Angle is me getting drunk and forgetting about today.Alright. To the Chip.These guys are pros, this is where they practice.Bet I start seeing you here weekly.Let's go inside. I wanna dance.Oh for God's sake, a Black man is president. Racism is dead, and even if it wasn't when he popped Bin Ladin he won over the hold outs.Who?Really... Invite him over.Married?Good guy?Yeah... Thanks.Don't discourage him. Know how long it's been since someone tied me up?I'm trying very hard to give you ideas.Okay.Take a look around back.What am I -- Uhh.What are you doing???No.Thank you, Dave.You saved my life.Are they following us?Thank you. I mean it.Where is he now?I hope they kill him.... No.I love how we're all going to pretend I planned this.Yeah ... So, can I go home tonight or ...Whoopee. Then we can call the Mexican police to go arrest their employer. Why do I think that won't happen?I'll be fine... They have your picture too, you know.I understand now, okay? They're everywhere and I'll never know who to trust, as evidenced by me fucking my hit man behind a bar.That doesn't scare you?What's the plan?We have tac gear in our car.Jesus.Because CIA can't operate within US borders without a domestic agency attached. Right?That's why we're here. That's the only reason.I don't think we've done THIS.Fair enough.THEN GO BACK.REGGIE!WHAT ARE YOU DOING??STEP AWAY. I mean it. Move away from him.We can't be here--You lured Manuel to Mexico so you could kill him. This is your cab driver.He's an assassin. A government ASSASSIN--Who is Medellin?? What is that?He works for the cartels in Colombia... He works for the fucking competition.Get away from me.Fucking kill me or get out of my way.I'll manage.Let's go.They woke me up. Showed me the whole thing.And I quit.Three days ago I hadn't had you in ten years... fucker.You're the only one who understands me.Please.You're an assassin.You are a Sicario.

MATT.raw_line: What do you know about his brother?Guillermo... Mexican police are holding him in Juarez. What do you know about his cousin?Number three in the Sinaloa Cartel.Loose lips sink ships, Kate.You married?Husband?Kids?We're expanding the scope of the investigation.Day after. Early.Gonna go see Guillermo.That's the one.Our objective is to dramatically overreact.He's a little green. You've been kicking doors longer.Makes you feel better to have him around, he can tag along after we get back from El Paso.The men who are REALLY responsible.We'll get to that...Don't want anything to happen to you on the way to the airport.To keep my promise.Doesn't matter. It leads to Fausto. And I'm going to turn you loose.Kate.This way.No. We just landed.This is my bird dog, his name's Alejandro.Yeah, we'll talk about it on the plane.Yeah.You guys don't have one?They got some bitchin peanuts in the back. Kind of a self-serve deal though.Good. Trying to get DOD to let me look into this conspiracy to sink Figi.I figure a month or two there, I could get it worked out.Yeah, I'll keep you posted... who's going over today?I get all warm and fuzzy when you say `team'.Where's everybody linking up?Thought you were in the big time in Phoenix... welcome to Baghdad.Man, I love Texans.Sure, we'll take the tour. Loan me a couple of pop guns?I will be by the time we get there.I miss your hospitality, Keith.Guess we're going sightseeing.See if this fits.Try it on.He's a DOD advisor, just like me.Pay attention to Alejandro -- he says do something, do it.Fine. Stay here.But you don't want to, do you?You asked to get on this train. Because you KNOW you're not stopping anything in Phoenix. You're just sweeping up the mess. In six months, every house you raid will be rigged with explosives... You want to find the men responsible? This is where we start.Yeah. That got a little nutty, huh?Hey. I told you to stay here...Don't sell yourself short. Reason Reggie's home is I know he's not ready for this, but he's gonna have to get ready real quick, because this is the future. Juarez is what happens when they dig in...On that note, I think you better stay out here.Giving him a belly full of water... you devil.Didn't think we'd get you here, did you?I love it when they don't hablo. Brought an old buddy of yours. Bet you `hablo' to him.Alejandro, he remembers you.Can they get them all in one place? No... I'm on a clock now, I can't wait... No, contact Bob Fiske. Have him hold all of them at the staging center. How far is Tuscon?We'll be there a little after 2.You gotta learn how to sleep on a plane.Has nothing to do with your race. I just don't believe you're good enough at your job yet to be of any use. Kate's sure fond of you, though.We'll be quick.You're so dramatic, Bob. This is Kate Macy with the FBI, and her partner `what's his name'... It was her call.First I've heard it.Two ways to find drug routes. You can play cat and mouse with those clowns, or ask these guys what trails they avoid.All yours.This feels very serious.Then go. I didn't ask you to be a part of this. She did.What would you like to know?Guillermo told us about a tunnel east of Nogales, near Sasabe. So now, we're trying to find what areas near there migrants avoid. Because that's where the tunnel will be. Better?I'm going back in.Guillermo didn't have any other options. We send him back across the border and he's a dead man. Had to give us something.We're going to make enough noise that Manuel Diaz is called back to Mexico to see HIS boss.And then we know where his boss is.It's been a humdinger of a day. Go home. Get some rest. We'll find a ride. See you tomorrow.Come on in.Guillermo was telling the truth.How good is your Spanish?Power of persuasion.We're gonna have a good day. Let's send these guys home.Think they'd tell us all this and then go back to Mexico? You get one night's sleep and forget everything?Have friends at Phoenix SWAT?They any good?Got a new frame of reference for practice now, don't you. Let's give Phoenix SWAT a call, shall we?When he comes out of the bank. We need the deposit receipt to seize the account. Let him do the assault... we hit him when he comes out.Endorsing over her paycheck.When he walks out of the bank, we pull beside and you take him.Now.KATE --We knew where his accounts were, we just didn't know they were shaking people down in front of the fucking branch. It's a bogus bust, though. Can't prosecute it. No one controls who deposits money in an account. An attorney will have that money back in a few months... but a lot of heads will roll before then...Don't you dare.You can't arrest him.You said that Ted.The beauty of you being so beat to shit... No one's gonna notice a couple more scratches... this is a new game, Ted.I'm the guy who will decide if your daughters get Federal protection or whether we post your ex wife's address on the internet. I decide whether you go to prison at a work camp in Missouri or a kill house like Corcoran. This is where you negotiate how to survive...Good job.You write it that way in the report. Yes?Real quick thinking, Kate.Sure ... This is good news. They're going to call Manuel back. Soon.Gotta have a little faith.We may have the tunnel, right here.We'll know soon enough.Tasty beverage?Going hunting.We'll save that for later.First thing, get that surveillance van operational.Do it.You aren't really dressed for it.You went crying to daddy yesterday. We don't want daddy to know everything. Loose lips sink ships, haven't you learned that yet? Don't worry, we got extra--Relax. You guys will hang back when we get there, k?Hey. All the drugs we find, you guys get to confiscate. Gonna be a big day.What. What. What's he saying?Where.We're gonna have to hit the tunnel the minute we get on the ground.Pretty exciting, huh?On foot from here.Weapons free, my friend.Where is the target?We need to boogie. And we need to do it quiet till we find the center.Good luck.They don't get freer buddy.Cross this and it's new rules.Is he through?This was a clean, clean fucking op my friend.She's not with you?Okay, let's go. We're missing one.Our government doesn't have assassins. We farm that out.Refers to a time when one group controlled every aspect of the drug trade. Providing a measure of order. That we can control.And until someone figures out how to convince 20 percent of the US population to stop smoking and snorting this shit, order is the best we can hope for... Alejandro is working to return that order.He works for whoever points him toward the people that made him, Kate. Us, them, anyone that will turn him loose.Take a breath and --Long walk back to Phoenix.
